text: Ertugrul Bayrak (born February 21, 1992) is a Dutch-Turkish kickboxer fighting for Glory. Bayrak is currently ranked #3 in the Glory middleweight division. ==Titles and accomplishments== * 2017 World Fighting League -86kg Champion * * 2018 World Fighting League -86kg Champion ==Kickboxing
